DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study study biomarkers tissue sample patient stage I stage III endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Tissue Samples From Patients With Stage I Stage III Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify microRNA expression pattern associate lymph node metastasis sample patient endometrial cancer . OUTLINE : Banked tumor tissue specimens analyze microRNA expression profile microarray analysis reverse transcriptase-PCR assay .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm endometrioid endometrial cancer Stage IA , IB , IC , IIIC disease Any grade Enrolled evaluate GOG0210 Molecular Staging Study Endometrial Cancer Consented allow specimen clinical data collect stored future research Underwent complete surgical staging , include follow : Hysterectomy Bilateral oophorectomy Washings well pelvic lymphadenectomy ( sample four leave four right pelvic lymph node ) Paraaortic lymphadenectomy ( sample one leave one right paraaortic lymph node ) Sufficient highquality freeze primary tumor test ≥ 75 % tumor cellularity ≤ 10 % necrosis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
